mapper.select:
SELECT co.id, ca.type,co.name, co.image, co.common_description, MIN(va.price) as price FROM components co JOIN component_variants va ON co.id = va.component_id JOIN categories ca ON ca.id = co.category_id
and co.category_id = #{categoryId}
and co.name like concat('%',#{searchContent},'%')
GROUP BY co.id
